name: Last.fm - No Ads, No CBS Stuff, All Regions
description:
Script removes advertisements on Last.fm.

Features:
- removes all ads on Last.fm pages
- removes CBS links from footer
- works on all Last.fm sites

Screenshots:
before - http://img695.imageshack.us/img695/4828/lastfmbefore.png
after - http://img41.imageshack.us/img41/1120/lastfmafter.png

before - http://img521.imageshack.us/img521/9103/lastfmbefore2.png
after - http://img63.imageshack.us/img63/8172/lastfmafter2.png
